title: Better
text: Our first camera went belly up.  They replaced it-no cost.  The new one has been working for over two years.  Initially the software interface wasn’t properly syncing when my wife and I were setting alarm from 2 phones.  They seem to have fixed that with a system wide software update.  They’re based in France.  So Customer support is awkward at best.

title: Exactly what I was hoping for
text: App has worked almost flawlessly.... Motion detection gives a great sense of security when away from home and works very well!!  Only negative so far is not being able to deactivate alarm when lights go out or internet connection is lost.

title: Abandoned MyFox For US Customers
text: It all worked great until about 5 months ago. Suddenly the MyFox camera I have suddenly stopped communicating with the app. Their support team takes weeks to respond and there is no longer US based support via phone. My parents and aunt both had the same thing happen to them. Trying to get help is like pulling teeth. I guess once they bought MyFox they decided to drop support for all of their products. Really disappointed, especially since I told my family to purchase the cameras and security system and now none of them work!

title: Love MyFox!
text:
Easy to install and use - instruction manual could be a little clearer (for example explicitly state that "privacy mode" just means the lens closes and does not otherwise modify functionality) and software glitches out once in a while (pretty rare and always resolves itself after a restart).

But overall a very good value for the $$.

title: Stay away!
text: I made the mistake to buy three of their cameras. Now they are all useless! None of them will connect or be paired to my phone. this pics of all my equipment matches with the requirements and there’s still no way to make them work! There is no customer support in the US whatsoever, and you are on your own to figure it out. This was the biggest waste of money ever! I have tried to contact customer support in Europe to no avail. I received no responses.

title: Monitoring option gone and customer support is lacking.
text: Works ok, but ever since they switched to Somfy, I can no longer sign up for monitoring services in the US. Calling their support team in France ended up costing me in long distance fees.

title: Stays away for privacy reason
text: Why the heck they need my detailed address info when adding a system to my account?  That is a no no for privacy reason.

title: Myfox App is great!
text: I started with the Myfox camera only, and the usage and UI of the app and the camera was very smooth. A few days later I decided I'd go for the alarm system as well, and it all ties in together perfectly. Very good app, very good product! I'll be buying a few more accessories to fully cover my apartment doors and windows.

title: Great camera and software
text: Love the camera and software. I recently returned my withings home camera. Way better camera and software. But please add iPad support and maybe Apple TV app. Need those for 5 stars! Oh, HomeKit support wouldn't be bad either... Just saying!

title: Elegant and easy to use
text:
The MyFox app is an elegant interface that is very easy to use. Setting or disabling the alarm is straight forward and accessing the camera smooth.

The app was extremely helpful while setting up the unit with step by step instructions.

title: Kevin C.
text: The system was easy to install and get up and running. Small monthly charge to be able to tape activity for reference seems reasonable. Nice to know images are captured at the door if necessary!

title: Works fine
text: Nice camera but needs to be close to router

title: MyFox for my kids room
text: The application and the products are perfect and working smoothly. I love it and keep going updating and upgrading your products.

title: Awesome App
text: Finally a device that secures ur home from hackers when ur home. Also such an easy product to use and feel secure.

title: Started out good not worth a crap now !
text: Loved it at first worked like it was advertised for the first month. Now it says no network detected no picture but picks up motion and notifies you of it. MyFox support blames the Internet provider and they say it's the camera. I guess it's going back to the store to let them sort out the problem ! Very unhappy !

title: App works well
text: Using camera to monitor house when we are not home. App is simple and works well.

title: Just perfect
text: This is so easy to install take about ten minutes to set up good pixels

title: Works Beautifully
text: Very happy with the camera and app.

title: MyFox system
text: Nice, discrete system. Simple to use app. Love it!!

title: Terrible app
text: Always disconnect your credentials. You have to type your login and password every time you connect since it is Somfy app.
